Plot: A married couple's life is turned upside down when the wife is accused of a murder.
Title: The Next Three Days
Writer: Paul Haggis (screenplay), Fred Cavayé (screenplay), Guillaume Lemans (screenplay)
Actors: Russell Crowe, Elizabeth Banks, Michael Buie, Moran Atias
tomatoConsensus: Russell Crowe and Elizabeth Banks give it their all, but their solid performances aren't quite enough to compensate for The Next Three Days' uneven pace and implausible plot.
